data.lyric:
[ti:Jocelyn Flores]
[ar:XXXTENTACION]
[al:17]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Jocelyn Flores - XXXTentacion
[00:00.39]I know you so well so well
[00:06.98]I mean I can do better than he can
[00:13.74]I've been pretty
[00:14.64]I know you're somewhere somewhere
[00:21.09]I've been trapped in my mind girl just holding on
[00:28.00]I don't wanna pretend we're something we're nothing
[00:35.72]I've been stuck thinking 'bout her
[00:39.36]I can't hold on
[00:42.51]I've been pretty
[00:43.33]I'm in pain wanna put 10 shots in my brain
[00:46.22]I've been trippin' 'bout some things can't change Suicidal
[00:48.44]Same time I'm tame
[00:49.41]Picture this in bed get a phone call
[00:51.34]Girl that you f**ked with killed herself
[00:53.21]That was this summer and nobody helped
[00:54.89]And ever since then man I hate myself
[00:56.26]Wanna f**kin' end it pessimistic
[00:58.69]All wanna see me with no pot to piss in
[01:00.05]But n**gas been excited 'bout the grave I'm diggin'
[01:02.00]Havin' conversations 'bout my haste decisions
[01:03.77]F**kin' sickenin' at the same time
[01:05.66]Memories surface through the grapevine
[01:06.86]'Bout my uncle playin' with a slip knot
[01:08.41]Post-traumatic stress got me f**ked up
[01:09.61]Been f**ked up since the couple months
[01:10.93]They had a n**ga locked up
[01:11.81]I'll be feelin' pain
[01:12.78]I'll be feelin' pain just to hold on
[01:18.11]And I don't feel the same
[01:20.25]I'm so numb
[01:25.49]I'll be feelin' pain
[01:26.95]I'll be feelin' pain just to hold on
[01:32.38]And I don't feel the same
[01:34.55]I'm so numb
[01:40.81]I know you so well
[01:43.39]I know you girl
[01:47.46]I mean I can do better than he can
[01:54.28]I've been pretty
[01:54.97]I know you so well
data.trans:
[ti:Jocelyn Flores]
[ar:XXXTENTACION]
[al:17]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.39]我非常了解你 非常了解
[00:06.98]我的意思是我比他更好
[00:13.74]我对你很好
[00:14.64]我知道你就在某处 就在某处
[00:21.09]我陷入思想的怪圈 女孩 坚持住
[00:28.00]我不想假装我们之间还有什么 我们毫无关系
[00:35.72]我脑海中全是你
[00:39.36]我无法控制
[00:42.51]我对你很好
[00:43.33]我陷入痛苦之中 只想给脑袋来个十枪
[00:46.22]我一直困扰着一些我无力改变的事情 就像是在自杀一般
[00:48.44]我被驯服了
[00:49.41]我躺在床上 想象着这一场景 电话想起
[00:51.34]女孩 你也生不如死
[00:53.21]那是一个夏天 没有人能帮你
[00:54.89]自那以后 我开始厌恶自己
[00:56.26]悲观的想要结束这一切
[00:58.69]都想看我走投无路的样子
[01:00.05]大家都兴奋地看着我自掘坟墓
[01:02.00]我有找人谈论过我的这些仓促的想法
[01:03.77]完全没用
[01:05.66]回忆又开始涌向脑海
[01:06.86]我的叔叔在搞乐队
[01:08.41]让我也加入进去来忘掉烦恼
[01:09.61]几个月之前就乱作一团了 
[01:10.93]他们把我看的严严实实
[01:11.81]我感到痛苦不堪 
[01:12.78]我感到痛苦不堪  坚持住
[01:18.11]感受不再相同
[01:20.25]我已麻木
[01:25.49]我感到痛苦不堪 
[01:26.95]我感到痛苦不堪  坚持住
[01:32.38]感受不再相同
[01:34.55]我已麻木
[01:40.81]女孩 我非常了解你
[01:43.39]女孩 我了解你
[01:47.46]我的意思是我比他更好
[01:54.28]我对你很好
[01:54.97]我如此了解你
